title: Proxy Singed confirmed viable in competitive play
body:
Rito please. It so unfun to play against and now its going to flood our games because LCS did it.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
OH HELL YES.

time to {{champion:75}} 

500 stacks by 20 minutes lets go. that was one of the most fun matchups ive ever played. i got to stack every single minion while that idiot kept proxying.

got to try {{champion:14}} next time.

I really think that {{item:1082}} 's potion passive should be unique. I don't think Rito intended people to be stacking it.

{{champion:27}} {{item:1082}} {{item:1082}} {{item:1082}}
I see that a lot and figured that was the reason people stacked it but didn't actually know if it worked or not
The actual stacks dont, but the 25% increased potions does
just wait til you get proxy singed vs proxy singed in blind draft

It doesnt counter Singed but it does allow you to match Singed in terms of clearspeed  and pressure o  the map. Ravenous Hydra.

The bonus lifesteal makes proxying yourself, and stealing jungle camps easier.
You can just play another proxy champ in return
